sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>thread</radical> is <radical>odd</radical>, but that's what makes it <kanji>beautiful</kanji>. It's a little frayed, it's a little miscolored, but that's what makes it appealing to you.
meaningInfo: If something is a bit odd, it's usually beautiful in its own way, just like this beautiful thread.
readingMnemonic: You take this <kanji>beautiful</kanji> thread and lock it up with a <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>). You want to keep it all to yourself, you want its beauty to be for your eyes only!
readingInfo: To remember that there's a beautiful thread hidden away, you tie a not-as-beautiful thread to the end of the key.
